title: 纯净1.12.2单机创建游戏会崩溃
author: hankexin
txt_content:
我换了好几个客户端创建世界都会崩溃
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// This doesn't make any sense!
Time: 8/23/19 11:31 PM
Description: Updating screen events

replies.author: mhc616@sina.com
replies.txt_content: 确定一下你的java版本和系统位数

replies.author: Tensins
replies.txt_content: 电脑版本问题吧，把启动器的运算内存调高

replies.author: hankexin
replies.txt_content:
mhc616@sina.com 发表于 2019-8-24 00:51
确定一下你的java版本和系统位数
java 8 最新的  系统64位

replies.author: hankexin
replies.txt_content:
Tensins 发表于 2019-8-24 08:08
电脑版本问题吧，把启动器的运算内存调高
纯净我给2G不够吗?
